verses.text: And at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* shall \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w* stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w*, the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* which \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and there shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*, such as never was since there was a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \add even\add* to that same \w time|strong="H6256"\w*: and at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall be \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w*, every one that shall be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w*.

And \w many|strong="H7227"\w* of them that \w sleep|strong="H3463"\w* in the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w* shall \w awake|strong="H6974"\w*, some to \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, and some to \w shame|strong="H2781"\w* \add and\add* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w contempt|strong="H1860"\w*.

And they that be \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* shall \w shine|strong="H2094"\w* as the \w brightness|strong="H2096"\w* of the \w firmament|strong="H7549"\w*; and they that turn \w many|strong="H7227"\w* to \w righteousness|strong="H6663"\w* as the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.\f + \fr 12.3 \ft wise: or, teachers\f*

But thou, O \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, shut \w up|strong="H5640"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w seal|strong="H2856"\w* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, \add even\add* to the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of the \w end|strong="H7093"\w*: \w many|strong="H7227"\w* shall run to and \w fro|strong="H7751"\w*, and \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* shall be \w increased|strong="H7235"\w*.

¶ Then I \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, there \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w*, the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* on this \w side|strong="H2008"\w* of the \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* on that side of the \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*.\f + \fr 12.5 \ft bank: Heb. lip\f*\f + \fr 12.5 \ft bank: Heb. lip\f*

And \add one\add* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* in \w linen|strong="H0906"\w*, which \add was\add* \w upon|strong="H4605"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*, How long \add shall it be to\add* the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of these \w wonders|strong="H6382"\w*?\f + \fr 12.6 \ft upon…: or, from above\f*

And I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* in \w linen|strong="H0906"\w*, which \add was\add* \w upon|strong="H4605"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*, when he held \w up|strong="H7311"\w* his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* and his left \w hand|strong="H8040"\w* unto \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* by him that \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* that \add it shall be\add* for a \w time|strong="H4150"\w*, \w times|strong="H4150"\w*, and an \w half|strong="H2677"\w*; and when he shall have \w accomplished|strong="H3615"\w* to \w scatter|strong="H5310"\w* the \w power|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, all these \add things\add* shall be \w finished|strong="H3615"\w*.\f + \fr 12.7 \ft a time…: or, part\f*

And I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, but I \w understood|strong="H0995"\w* not: then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, O my \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*, what \add shall be\add* the \w end|strong="H0319"\w* of these \add things\add*?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go thy \w way|strong="H3212"\w*, \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*: for the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \add are\add* closed \w up|strong="H5640"\w* and \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* till the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of the \w end|strong="H7093"\w*.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* shall be \w purified|strong="H1305"\w*, and made \w white|strong="H3835"\w*, and \w tried|strong="H6884"\w*; but the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall do \w wickedly|strong="H7561"\w*: and none of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall \w understand|strong="H0995"\w*; but the \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* shall \w understand|strong="H0995"\w*.

And from the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \add that\add* the \w daily|strong="H8548"\w* \add sacrifice\add* shall be taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w*, and the \w abomination|strong="H8251"\w* that maketh \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* set \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \add there shall be\add* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w ninety|strong="H8673"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 12.11 \ft the abomination: Heb. to set up the abomination\f*\f + \fr 12.11 \ft maketh…: or, astonisheth\f*

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* he that \w waiteth|strong="H2442"\w*, and \w cometh|strong="H5060"\w* to the \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

But go thou thy \w way|strong="H3212"\w* till the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* \add be:\add* for thou shalt \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*, and \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* in thy \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* at the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of the \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 12.13 \ft for thou: or, and thou, etc\f*
